57 class MoveRelative : public PropagatingEitherWay
58 {
59 public:
60  MoveRelative(const std::string& name = "move relative",
61  const solvers::PlannerInterfacePtr& planner = solvers::PlannerInterfacePtr());
62 
63  void init(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) override;
64  void computeForward(const InterfaceState& from) override;
65  void computeBackward(const InterfaceState& to) override;
66 
67  void setGroup(const std::string& group) { setProperty("group", group); }
69  void setIKFrame(const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& pose) { setProperty("ik_frame", pose); }
70  void setIKFrame(const Eigen::Isometry3d& pose, const std::string& link);
71  template <typename T>
72  void setIKFrame(const T& p, const std::string& link) {
73  Eigen::Isometry3d pose;
74  pose = p;
75  setIKFrame(pose, link);
76  }
77  void setIKFrame(const std::string& link) { setIKFrame(Eigen::Isometry3d::Identity(), link); }
78 
80  void setMinDistance(double distance) { setProperty("min_distance", distance); }
81  void setMaxDistance(double distance) { setProperty("max_distance", distance); }
82  void setMinMaxDistance(double min_distance, double max_distance) {
83  setProperty("min_distance", min_distance);
84  setProperty("max_distance", max_distance);
85  }
86 
87  void setPathConstraints(moveit_msgs::Constraints path_constraints) {
88  setProperty("path_constraints", std::move(path_constraints));
89  }
90 
92  void setDirection(const geometry_msgs::TwistStamped& twist) { setProperty("direction", twist); }
94  void setDirection(const geometry_msgs::Vector3Stamped& direction) { setProperty("direction", direction); }
96  void setDirection(const std::map<std::string, double>& joint_deltas) { setProperty("direction", joint_deltas); }
97 
98 protected:
99  // return false if trajectory shouldn't be stored
100  bool compute(const InterfaceState& state, planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr& scene, SubTrajectory& trajectory,
101  Direction dir);
102 
103 protected:
104  solvers::PlannerInterfacePtr planner_;
105 };
